title: Follow live: Pacers, Knicks firing on all cylinders early in ECF Game 1
author: ESPN staff

title: Longtime Colts owner and CEO Irsay dies at 65
description: Jim Irsay, who had led the Colts since 1997 and presided over one of the storied franchise's greatest eras, died Wednesday.
author: Stephen Holder

title: 'I'm a winner' - inside Postecoglou's second season at Tottenham
description: BBC Sport's senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel takes you inside Tottenham's undulating road to glory.

title: How Postecoglou abandoned 'Ange-ball' to win Europa League
description: From all-out attack to parking the bus - how Ange Postecoglou changed his style in order to guide Tottenham to Europa League glory.

title: Pep: I'll quit if Man City squad gets too large
description: Pep Guardiola has claimed he would quit as Manchester City boss if he is given too big a squad next season because he cannot bear to leave a large number of fit players out.

title: Cook to make England debut in Zimbabwe Test
description: Sam Cook will make his England debut in the four-day Test match against Zimbabwe at Trent Bridge from Thursday, live on Sky Sports.

title: Jim Irsay dies at 65: Peyton Manning, NFL world pay tribute to longtime Colts owner
description: The NFL world paid tribute to Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay, who died Wednesday at 65.

title: The Pittsburgh Steelers Announced the Signing of Lineman Nick Broeker
description: The Pittsburgh Steelers are continuing to make roster moves this offseason in anticipation of the 2025 campaign.
